sentences.en: A report compiled by the Fed's Philadelphia branch described the economy as weak.
sentences.cn: 一份由联邦储备银行的费城分部汇编的报告说经济不景气。

sentences.en: At last he does write from Philadelphia terminating the engagement.
sentences.cn: 最后,他才从费城来信废除婚约.

sentences.en: Bank is a 38-year-old singleton who grew up in Philadelphia.
sentences.cn: 班克是一名38岁的单身汉，在费城长大。

sentences.en: During a construction project in Philadelphia in 1875, the body was unearthed by accident.
sentences.cn: 这具遗体在1875年费城的一项结构工程中被意外发现。

sentences.en: He was a peppery little lieutenant j . g . from Philadelphia named Samtow.
sentences.cn: 他是费城人,名叫萨姆托,说话尖刻,个子矮小,是个海军中尉.

sentences.en: Here is a letter adapted from DEAR ABBY , Philadelphia Bulletin , March 9, 1973.
sentences.cn: 这里摘登一封'亲爱的爱毕'的回信, 刊登在一九七三年三月九日的'费城公报'上.

sentences.en: I am not a beginner in politics in Philadelphia.
sentences.cn: 我对费拉德尔斐亚市的政治并不是一无所知的人.

sentences.en: I am only one of those who have a slight say in the affairs of Philadelphia.
sentences.cn: 我只是对费拉德尔斐亚市的事情略微有些影响的人之一而已.

sentences.en: Mr. Smith commutes between New York and Philadelphia.
sentences.cn: 史密斯先生通勤于纽约和费城之间.

sentences.en: Philadelphia may be known as home of the establishment and ethnics.
sentences.cn: 费城也许是名门和族裔之乡.

sentences.en: Philadelphia was no longer pleasing to him.
sentences.cn: 他觉得费城再也不值得留恋了.

sentences.en: The forearm and torch of the Statue of Liberty on display at the Centennial Exposition in Philadelphia, 1876.
sentences.cn: 1876年，在费城的百年纪念博览会，自由女神的前臂和火炬进行展示。

sentences.en: The only time that we attempted to do something like that was in the city of Philadelphia.
sentences.cn: 只有在费城那次我们曾试着做那样的事。

sentences.en: This is somewhat different from the atmosphere which prevailed in Philadelphia -- more breezy and generous.
sentences.cn: 这里和费城的气氛有些不同 —— 比较活泼,比较爽气.

sentences.en: Through Franklin's efforts, too, the streets of Philadelphia were paved.
sentences.cn: 费城的街道也是通过富兰克林的努力铺设的.

sentences.en: When I was a kid in Philadelphia, I must have read every comic book ever published.
sentences.cn: 我小时在费城, 对当时出版的每一本小人书我肯定都读过.

sentences.en: You know, I was in that plane that just crashed outside Philadelphia.
sentences.cn: 你知道吗, 我就在那架刚刚在费城外坠落的飞机上.

trans.tran_cn: 费城（美国宾西法尼亚州东南部港市）
